org.apache.drill.test

Class QueryTestUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.test.QueryTestUtil

  • public class QueryTestUtil
extends Object
    Utilities useful for tests that issue SQL queries.

      • createClient

        public static DrillClient createClient(DrillConfig drillConfig,
                                       RemoteServiceSet remoteServiceSet,
                                       int maxWidth,
                                       Properties props)
                                throws RpcException,
                                       OutOfMemoryException
        Create a DrillClient that can be used to query a drill cluster.
        Parameters:
        drillConfig -
        remoteServiceSet - remote service set
        maxWidth - maximum width per node
        props - Connection properties contains properties such as "user", "password", "schema" etc
        Returns:
        the newly created client
        Throws:
        RpcException - if there is a problem setting up the client
        OutOfMemoryException

      • normalizeQuery

        public static String normalizeQuery(String query)
        Normalize the query relative to the test environment.

        Looks for "${WORKING_PATH}" in the query string, and replaces it the current working patch obtained from TestTools.WORKING_PATH.

        Parameters:
        query - the query string
        Returns:
        the normalized query string

      • testRunAndOutput

        public static void testRunAndOutput(DrillClient drillClient,
                                    String queryString,
                                    boolean print)
                             throws Exception
        Execute one or more queries separated by semicolons, and output the results.
        Parameters:
        drillClient - drill client to use
        queryString - the query string
        print - True to output results to stdout. False to log results.
        Throws:
        Exception - An error while running the query.

      • setupScalarReplacementOption

        public static OptionValue setupScalarReplacementOption(Drillbit drillbit,
                                                       ClassTransformer.ScalarReplacementOption srOption)
        Set up the options to test the scalar replacement retry option (see ClassTransformer.java). Scalar replacement rewrites bytecode to replace value holders (essentially boxed values) with their member variables as locals. There is still one pattern that doesn't work, and occasionally new ones are introduced. This can be used in tests that exercise failing patterns.

        This also flushes the compiled code cache.

        Parameters:
        drillbit - the drillbit
        srOption - the scalar replacement option value to use
        Returns:
        the original scalar replacement option setting (so it can be restored)

      • restoreScalarReplacementOption

        public static void restoreScalarReplacementOption(Drillbit drillbit,
                                                  String srOption)
        Restore the original scalar replacement option returned from setupScalarReplacementOption().

        This also flushes the compiled code cache.

        Parameters:
        drillbit - the drillbit
        srOption - the scalar replacement option value to use

      • getFreePortNumber

        public static int getFreePortNumber(int portNumber,
                                    int numberOfAttempts)
                             throws IOException
        Checks that port with specified number is free and returns it. Otherwise, increases port number and checks until free port is found or the number of attempts is reached specified numberOfAttempts
        Parameters:
        portNumber - initial port number
        numberOfAttempts - max number of attempts to find port with greater number
        Returns:
        free port number
        Throws:
        BindException - if free port was not found and all attempts were used.
        IOException
